name: VR Motorbike Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Motorbike Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
description:
Health and Safety Warning!
Remain stationary when using this Virtual Reality Application. If you experience any discomfort or health reaction stop using the Application. Ensure you have read "Health and Safety Warnings" document provided below before using this Application.
http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf
------

Experience real motor racing in amazing 360 view of Virtual Reality.

Now you can speed through the city of Dubai and experience extreme motorbike crashes. You won't believe the experience of flying 50 meters as rag doll while wearing VR glasses.

This is not a tour. You have compete control over the motorbike. The motorbike will tilt with movement of your body! No controller needed!

Ride with Mia and show her the town ;).

Credits
http://wenklystudio.com/Legal/Credits/MotorBikeSimulator.html
